Habang may problema ng COVID-19, ito pa rin ang magiging priority natin so huwag mag-aalala ang ating mga kababayan," Interior Secretary Eduardo Año added. Wed, 17 Jun 2020 09:15:56 +0800

Año to Cebu City Mayor Labella: Make use of time to enforce lockdown, make contact tracing, mass testing tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-742968 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/regions/742968/ano-to-cebu-city-mayor-labella-make-use-of-time-to-enforce-lockdown-make-contact-tracing-mass-testing/story/ "Wala namang problema kung gusto nila mag-appeal pero 'yan ay nirecommend ng IATF at inapprove ng Pangulo, nagkausap kami ni Mayor Labella actually kahapon, sabi ko, 'okay lang kung magappeal ka pero gamitin mo rin 'yung period na 'to mayor para ilockdown 'yung Cebu City, tutulungan ka ng Philippine National Police," Interior Secretary Eduardo Año said. "Hindi ito pagpaparusa sa taga-Cebu, ito ay para mabigyan ng pagkakataon na makapagcontact tracing, makapagtesting tayo at mailagay natin sa quarantine ang lahat ng tao..." he added.
